snippet: The Met said it was seeking cuts of between 16 and 17 percent from the 16 unions representing its workers, whose contracts all expire at the end of July.
abstract: The Met said it was seeking cuts of between 16 and 17 percent from the 16 unions representing its workers, whose contracts all expire at the end of July.

headline.main: Labor Talks Begin at Metropolitan Opera

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Alliance of Theatrical Stage Employees
